alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lake; Lorain; Medina; Portage; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 20 at 6:09PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An steady to heavy lake effect snow band will affect Portage...southern Geauga...Medina...Cuyahoga...southwestern Lake...Summit and northern Lorain Counties Until 715 PM EST.... At 607 PM EST, radar indicated a steady to heavy lake effect snow band along a line extending from Solon to near North Ridgeville, shifting southward and southeastward at 10 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility rapidly dropping to a quarter of a mile. Quick one inch of snow accumulation as band moves through. Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Akron, Lorain, Elyria, Medina, Willowick, Ravenna, Parma, Lakewood, Cuyahoga Falls, Euclid, Cleveland Heights, Strongsville, Brunswick, Westlake, North Royalton, North Ridgeville, Kent, Barberton, and Solon. Use extra caution if you must travel through this snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 301, 302, 303, 304, 305, 306, 307, 308, 309, 310, 311, 312, 313, 316, 317, 318, 319, 320, 321, 322, 323, 324, 325, 327, 328, 329, 602, 603, 606, 607, 613, 614, 615, 616, 617, 604, and 605.
